channel.title: Tracking progress :: Hotel California of Creative Writing
channel.description: Track-table Track-table keeps track of words written per day Clocking time c x i to clock in. c x o to clock out. c x q to cancel a clock. There is also the option of starting a 20 minute Pomodoro session, by pressing B. Clocking is tied to the heading you are working under, and will add a `:LOGBOOK:` section to it, like this: :LOGBOOK: CLOCK: [2017-04-10 Mon 15:16]--[2017-04-10 Mon 15:17] => 0:01 CLOCK: [2017-04-07 Fri 16:05]--[2017-04-07 Fri 16:35] => 0:30 CLOCK: [2017-04-05 Wed 16:42]--[2017-04-05 Wed 16:52] => 0:10 :END: We can generate clock report table by executing C-c l c R or M-x org-clock-report. The following will be inserted at point, depending on the logbooks in the current document:
